module.name: User Management
module.description: This Module manages all FreePBX users excluding Administrators (at this time). It allows an Administrator to create a User Account that can be used by other applications for login or API purposes. Modules like iSymphony or Rest API or the Upcoming User Control Panel will use this module to manage their users.
module.changelog: *2.11.0beta8* Fixes FREEPBX-7253 dont try to use the array if its false *2.11.0beta7* Fixes FREEPBX-7245 forgetting user data on inital add *2.11.0beta6* Skinning Changes *2.11.0beta5* Spelling Mistakes *2.11.0beta4* Cleanup and Extensive Documentation *2.11.0beta3* Move Processes into hook function for 2.11 *2.11.0beta2* Fixed the order of updating users *2.11.0beta1* Change to beta *2.11.0alpha2* Add more fields *2.11.0alpha1* Initial Module
